woodWallDescription.english: This wooden wall doesn't look very trustworthy but it's a good start.
woodWallDescription.german: Zugegeben: Diese Holzwand sieht nicht sehr vertrauenswürdig aus. Für den Anfang reicht sie allerdings.
woodWallDescription.french: Ce mur en bois ne semble pas très fiable mais c'est un bon début.
woodWallDescription.spanish: Esta pared de madera no se ve muy fiable, pero para el principio está bien.
woodWallDescription.portuguese: Esta parede de madeira não parece muito confiável, mas é um bom começo.
woodWallDescription.bulgarian: Тази дървена стена не изглежда много надеждна, но е добро начало.
woodWallDescription.turkish: Bu ahşap duvar çok güvenilir gözükmüyor ama başlangıç için güzeldir.

cleanWoodWallCrossDescription.english: Well made wooden wall for settlers with good taste.
cleanWoodWallCrossDescription.german: Sauber gearbeite Bretterwand für designbewusste Siedler.
cleanWoodWallCrossDescription.french: Mur en bois pour les colons qui ont de bons goûts.
cleanWoodWallCrossDescription.spanish: Pared trabajada de tablones de madera para colonos de buen gusto.
cleanWoodWallCrossDescription.portuguese: Parede de madeira bem feita para colonos de bom gosto.
cleanWoodWallCrossDescription.bulgarian: Добре изработена дървена стена за заселници с добър вкус.
cleanWoodWallCrossDescription.turkish: Zevke sahip yerleşimciler için iyi yapılmış ahşap duvar.

cleanWoodWallUpDescription.english: Well made wooden wall for settlers with good taste.
cleanWoodWallUpDescription.german: Sauber gearbeite Bretterwand für designbewusste Siedler.
cleanWoodWallUpDescription.french: Mur en bois pour les colons qui ont de bons goûts.
cleanWoodWallUpDescription.spanish: Pared trabajada de tablones de madera para colonos de buen gusto.
cleanWoodWallUpDescription.portuguese: Parede de madeira bem feita para colonos de bom gosto.
cleanWoodWallUpDescription.bulgarian: Добре изработена дървена стена за заселници с добър вкус.
cleanWoodWallUpDescription.turkish: Zevke sahip yerleşimciler için iyi yapılmış ahşap duvar.

roughWoodWallDescription.english: This wall is probably a good choice for all the nature-loving colonists out there.
roughWoodWallDescription.german: Für all die naturliebenden Kolonisten da draußen ist diese Wand sicher eine gute Wahl.
roughWoodWallDescription.french: Ce mur est probablement un bon choix pour tous les colons amoureux de la nature qui vivent ici.
roughWoodWallDescription.spanish: Este muro es una buena elección para los colonos amantes de la naturaleza.
roughWoodWallDescription.portuguese: Este muro é provavelmente uma boa escolha para todos os colonos que amam a natureza.
roughWoodWallDescription.bulgarian: Тази стена вероятно е добър избор за всички любители на природата.
roughWoodWallDescription.turkish: Bu duvar muhtemelen tüm doğa aşığı yerleşimciler için iyi bir seçim olacak

woodWallOverlapDescription.english: Timeless wood wall with angled planks.
woodWallOverlapDescription.french: Mur en bois intemporel avec des planches inclinées.
woodWallOverlapDescription.spanish: Eterno muro de madera con tablones angulados.
woodWallOverlapDescription.portuguese: Parede de madeira atemporal com tábuas anguladas.
woodWallOverlapDescription.bulgarian: Вечна дървена стена с ъглови дъски
woodWallOverlapDescription.turkish: Açılı plakalar ile zamanın ötesinde bir ahşap duvar

fachwerk0WallDescription.english: That's some solid and good looking piece of wall, just like it was used for houses in medieval Europe.
fachwerk0WallDescription.german: Diese verlässiche deutsche Fachwerkwand wird dich beim Häuserbau sicher nicht enttäuschen.
fachwerk0WallDescription.french: Ce mur solide et beau était utilisé pour les logements pendant l'Europe médiévale.
fachwerk0WallDescription.spanish: Esta pared originaria de Alemania seguro no decepcionará a nadie.
fachwerk0WallDescription.portuguese: Isso é um pedaço de parede sólido e bonito, assim como foi usado para casas na Europa medieval.
fachwerk0WallDescription.bulgarian: Това е някаква солидна и добре изглеждаща част от стената, точно както беше използвана за къщи в средновековна Европа.
fachwerk0WallDescription.turkish: Bu, Orta Çağ Avrupasındaki evlerde olduğu gibi sağlam ve güzel görünümlü bir duvar parçası.

fachwerk1WallDescription.english: That's some solid and good looking piece of wall, just like it was used for houses in medieval Europe.
fachwerk1WallDescription.german: Diese verlässiche deutsche Fachwerkwand wird dich beim Häuserbau sicher nicht enttäuschen.
fachwerk1WallDescription.french: Ce mur solide et beau était utilisé pour les logements pendant l'Europe médiévale.
fachwerk1WallDescription.spanish: Esta pared originaria de Alemania seguro no decepcionará a nadie.
fachwerk1WallDescription.portuguese: Isso é um pedaço de parede sólido e bonito, assim como foi usado para casas na Europa medieval.
fachwerk1WallDescription.bulgarian: Това е някаква солидна и добре изглеждаща част от стената, точно както беше използвана за къщи в средновековна Европа.
fachwerk1WallDescription.turkish: Bu, Orta Çağ Avrupasındaki evlerde olduğu gibi sağlam ve güzel görünümlü bir duvar parçası.

fachwerk2WallDescription.english: That's some solid and good looking piece of wall, just like it was used for houses in medieval Europe.
fachwerk2WallDescription.german: Diese verlässiche deutsche Fachwerkwand wird dich beim Häuserbau sicher nicht enttäuschen.
fachwerk2WallDescription.french: Ce mur solide et beau était utilisé pour les logements pendant l'Europe médiévale.
fachwerk2WallDescription.spanish: Esta pared originaria de Alemania seguro no decepcionará a nadie.
fachwerk2WallDescription.portuguese: Isso é um pedaço de parede sólido e bonito, assim como foi usado para casas na Europa medieval.
fachwerk2WallDescription.bulgarian: Това е някаква солидна и добре изглеждаща част от стената, точно както беше използвана за къщи в средновековна Европа.
fachwerk2WallDescription.turkish: Bu, Orta Çağ Avrupasındaki evlerde olduğu gibi sağlam ve güzel görünümlü bir duvar parçası.

fachwerk3WallDescription.english: That's some solid and good looking piece of wall, just like it was used for houses in medieval Europe.
fachwerk3WallDescription.german: Diese verlässiche deutsche Fachwerkwand wird dich beim Häuserbau sicher nicht enttäuschen.
fachwerk3WallDescription.french: Ce mur solide et beau était utilisé pour les logements pendant l'Europe médiévale.
fachwerk3WallDescription.spanish: Esta pared originaria de Alemania seguro no decepcionará a nadie.
fachwerk3WallDescription.portuguese: Isso é um pedaço de parede sólido e bonito, assim como foi usado para casas na Europa medieval.
fachwerk3WallDescription.bulgarian: Това е някаква солидна и добре изглеждаща част от стената, точно както беше използвана за къщи в средновековна Европа.
fachwerk3WallDescription.turkish: Bu, Orta Çağ Avrupasındaki evlerde olduğu gibi sağlam ve güzel görünümlü bir duvar parçası.

stoneWallDescription.english: While this stone wall might be cold to the touch, it's suitable for workshops.
stoneWallDescription.german: Auch wenn diese kalte Steinwand vielleicht nicht die beste Wahl für ein gemütliches Schlafzimmer ist, so eignet sie sich doch ganz gut für Arbeitsräume.
stoneWallDescription.french: Bien que ce mur de pierre puisse être froid au toucher, il est approprié pour les ateliers.
stoneWallDescription.spanish: Mientras esta fría pared no es la mejor elección para una habitación, queda bien con un taller.
stoneWallDescription.portuguese: Enquanto esta parede de pedra pode estar fria ao toque, é adequada para oficinas.
stoneWallDescription.bulgarian: Макар тази каменна стена да е студена на допир, тя е подходяща за работилници.
stoneWallDescription.turkish: Bu taştan duvar soğuk hissettirse de atölye çalışmalarına uygundur.

stoneWallCleanBricks.french: Mur de Brique en Pierre Lisse
stoneWallCleanBricks.portuguese: Parede de tijolos de pedra lisa

stoneWallCleanBricksDescription.english: Perfect for dungeons - but this stone wall can also be used for various less creepy projects.
stoneWallCleanBricksDescription.german: Neben düsteren Kerkern können mit dieser Steinwand natürlich auch weniger grußelige Projekte umgesetzt werden.
stoneWallCleanBricksDescription.french: Parfait pour les donjons - mais cette pierre pourrait aussi être utilisée pour des projets moins effrayants.
stoneWallCleanBricksDescription.spanish: Perfecto para mazmorras, pero también queda bien con proyectos menos oscuros.
stoneWallCleanBricksDescription.portuguese: Perfeito para masmorras - mas este muro de pedra também pode ser usado para vários projetos menos assustadores.
stoneWallCleanBricksDescription.bulgarian: Перфектен за подземията - но тази каменна стена може да се използва и за различни малко зловещи проекти.
stoneWallCleanBricksDescription.turkish: Zindanlar için mükemmel- fakat bu taş duvar ayrıca daha ürkütücü projelerde de kullanılabilir.

stoneWallCleanTileDescription.english: With this wall you can really impress the neighbors.
stoneWallCleanTileDescription.german: Mit dieser Fließenwand kannst du deine Nachbarn so richtig beeindrucken.
stoneWallCleanTileDescription.french: Avec ce mur vous pouvez réellement impressionner vos voisins.
stoneWallCleanTileDescription.spanish: Con este muro puedes impresionar a tus vecinos.
stoneWallCleanTileDescription.portuguese: Com esta parede você pode realmente impressionar os vizinhos.
stoneWallCleanTileDescription.bulgarian: С тази стена наистина можете да впечатлите съседите.
stoneWallCleanTileDescription.turkish: Bu duvar ile komşularınızı cidden etkileyebilirsiniz.

fenceWoodSimpleDescription.english: This wood fence has seen better days for sure. Better hope the next guest won't take it appart.
fenceWoodSimpleDescription.german: Dieser Holzzaun hat sicher bessere Tage gesehen. Hoffen wir mal, dass ihn der nächste Windstoß nicht einfach auseinandernimmt!
fenceWoodSimpleDescription.french: Cette clôture en bois a vu des jours meilleurs.
fenceWoodSimpleDescription.spanish: Esta valla de madera seguro ha visto días mejores. Esperemos que resista el siguiente ventarrón.
fenceWoodSimpleDescription.portuguese: Esta cerca de madeira tem visto melhores dias com certeza. É melhor esperar que o próximo convidado não o desmonte.
fenceWoodSimpleDescription.bulgarian: Тази дървена ограда със сигурност е виждала по-добри дни. По-добре да се надяваме, че следващият гост няма да го раздели.
fenceWoodSimpleDescription.turkish: Bu tahta çit eminiz ki daha iyi günler görmüştü. Umalım ki sonraki misafiri parçalamasın.

fenceWoodLogLeatherDescription.english: This fence won't stop hostiles from getting to your precious colony. Then again it looks nice so just build it anyways.
fenceWoodLogLeatherDescription.german: Dieser Holzzaun wird wohl keine Feinde davon abhalten deine Kolonie anzugreifen. Er schaut allerdings ganz gut und das ist doch auch was wert oder?
fenceWoodLogLeatherDescription.french: Cette clôture n'empêchera pas les ennemis d'entrer dans votre précieuse colonie. Elle semble toutefois agréable.
fenceWoodLogLeatherDescription.spanish: Esta valla no detendrá a los enemigos de tu preciada colonia. Pero de todas maneras se ve bien, ¿No lo vale?
fenceWoodLogLeatherDescription.portuguese: Esta cerca não impedirá que os inimigos entrem na sua preciosa colônia. Mas ela parece cool na mesma.
fenceWoodLogLeatherDescription.bulgarian: Тази ограда няма да попречи на враговете да стигнат до вашата ценна колония. Новъпреки  това отново изглежда добре, така че просто я изградете.
fenceWoodLogLeatherDescription.turkish: Bu çit düşmanların değerli kolonine ulaşmasını engellmeyecek. Ama oldukça güzel görünüyor yine de inşa et.

woodFloorDescription.english: Yeah, this wooden floor won't win design awards but it's better than nothing, right?
woodFloorDescription.german: Ja, mit diesem einfachen Holzboden wird dein Haus keine Schönheitswettbewerbe gewinnen, aber besser als nichts, oder?.
woodFloorDescription.french: Oui, ce plancher ne gagnera pas le prix du meilleur design mais c'est mieux que rien, n'est-ce pas ?
woodFloorDescription.spanish: Sí, con este piso no ganarás ningún premio de mejor diseño, pero es mejor a nada, ¿no?
woodFloorDescription.portuguese: Sim, este piso de madeira não vai ganhar prêmios de design, mas é melhor que nada, certo?
woodFloorDescription.bulgarian: Да, този дървен под няма да спечели награди за дизайн, но е по-добре от нищо, нали?
woodFloorDescription.turkish: Evet, bu tahta zemin tasarım ödüllerini kazanmaz ama hiç bir şey olmamasından iyidir değil mi?

cleanWoodFloorDescription.english: Only the finest trees get assembled to this exquisite piece of flooring!
cleanWoodFloorDescription.german: Nur die edelsten Bäume werden zu diesem exquisiten Boden verarbeitet!
cleanWoodFloorDescription.french: Seuls les arbres de qualité se sont assemblés à cette magnifique pièce de plancher.
cleanWoodFloorDescription.spanish: Sólo los más finos árboles pueden formar este exquisito suelo.
cleanWoodFloorDescription.portuguese: Apenas as melhores árvores são montadas neste requintado piso!
cleanWoodFloorDescription.bulgarian: Само най-добрите дървета се сглобяват към този изискан паркет!
cleanWoodFloorDescription.turkish: Bu zarif döşeme parçası sadece en iyi ağaçlar ile yapılır!

medievalWoodFloorDescription.german: Wenn Böden Geschichten erzählen könnten, wärst du mit diesem bestens unterhalten.
medievalWoodFloorDescription.french: Si les planchers pouvaient raconter des histoires...
medievalWoodFloorDescription.spanish: Si los pisos pudieran contar historias...
medievalWoodFloorDescription.portuguese: Se o chão pudesse contar histórias ...

parquetDescription.english: While rather expensive, this parquet redefines the general idea of wood floors entirely. Let your colonists feel the difference.
parquetDescription.german: Er mag teuer sein, doch dieses Parkett ist so viel mehr als ein gewöhnlicher Fußboden.
parquetDescription.french: Plus coûteux, ce parquet redéfinit l'idée générale des planchers en bois. Laissez vos colons sentir la différence.
parquetDescription.spanish: Si bien es bastante caro, este parquet redefine absolutamente la idea de los pisos de madera. Deja a tus colonos sentir la diferencia.
parquetDescription.portuguese: Embora bastante caro, este parquete redefine inteiramente a idéia geral de pisos de madeira. Deixe seus colonos sentir a diferença.
parquetDescription.bulgarian: Макар и доста скъп, този паркет предефинира общата идея за дървени подове изцяло. Нека вашите колонисти усещат разликата.
parquetDescription.turkish: Bu parke, oldukça pahalı olsa da ahşap zeminlerin genel fikrini tamamen anlatıyor. Yerleşimcilerinin farkı hissetmesini sağla.

ornamentWoodFloorDescription.english: An easy way to add some style to your floors.
ornamentWoodFloorDescription.german: Zeit für Abwechslung: Mit diesem Boden lassen sich monotone Strukturen aufbrechen.
ornamentWoodFloorDescription.french: Une manière simple d'ajouter du style à vos planchers
ornamentWoodFloorDescription.spanish: Una manera sencilla de darle ese estilo a tus suelos.
ornamentWoodFloorDescription.portuguese: Uma maneira fácil de adicionar algum estilo aos seus pavimentos.
ornamentWoodFloorDescription.bulgarian: Лесен начин да добавите стил към подовете си.
ornamentWoodFloorDescription.turkish: Zemininize biraz şıklık eklemenin kolay yolu...

ornamentWoodFloorCrossDescription.english: An easy way to add some style to your floors.
ornamentWoodFloorCrossDescription.german: Zeit für Abechslung: Mit diesem Boden lassen sich monotone Strukturen aufbrechen.
ornamentWoodFloorCrossDescription.french: Une manière simple d'ajouter du style à vos planchers.
ornamentWoodFloorCrossDescription.spanish: Una manera sencilla de darle ese estilo a tus suelos.
ornamentWoodFloorCrossDescription.portuguese: Uma maneira fácil de adicionar algum estilo aos seus pavimentos.
ornamentWoodFloorCrossDescription.bulgarian: Лесен начин да добавите стил към подовете си.
ornamentWoodFloorCrossDescription.turkish: Zemininize biraz şıklık eklemenin kolay yolu...

ornamentWoodFloorMetalDescription.english: Dwarf up your colony with this stylish floor.
ornamentWoodFloorMetalDescription.german: Für die Zwergenliebhaber unter deinen Kolonisten ist dieser Boden wie geschaffen.
ornamentWoodFloorMetalDescription.french: Pour les amoureux des nains, ce sol est parfait.
ornamentWoodFloorMetalDescription.spanish: Creado para los amantes de los enanos.
ornamentWoodFloorMetalDescription.portuguese: Para os amantes do anão, este andar é perfeito.
ornamentWoodFloorMetalDescription.bulgarian: Съдете колонията си с този стилен под.
ornamentWoodFloorMetalDescription.turkish: Yerleşimcilerini cüce olarak görmeyi sevenler için bu zemin yapılmış.

ornamentWoodFloorMetalCrossDescription.english: Dwarf up your colony with this stylish floor.
ornamentWoodFloorMetalCrossDescription.german: Für die Zwergenliebhaber unter deinen Kolonisten ist dieser Boden wie geschaffen.
ornamentWoodFloorMetalCrossDescription.french: Pour les amoureux des nains, ce sol est parfait.
ornamentWoodFloorMetalCrossDescription.spanish: Creado para los amantes de los enanos.
ornamentWoodFloorMetalCrossDescription.portuguese: Para os amantes do anão, este andar é perfeito.
ornamentWoodFloorMetalCrossDescription.bulgarian: Съдете колонията си с този стилен под.
ornamentWoodFloorMetalCrossDescription.turkish: Yerleşimcilerini cüce olarak görmeyi sevenler için bu zemin yapılmış.

stoneFloorDescription.english: While this stone floor might be cold to the touch it's suitable for workshops.
stoneFloorDescription.german: Auch wenn dieser kalte Steinboden vielleicht nicht die beste Wahl für ein gemütliches Schlafzimmer ist, so eignet er sich doch ganz gut für Arbeitsräume.
stoneFloorDescription.french: Bien que ce sol en pierre puisse être froid au toucher, il est approprié pour les ateliers.
stoneFloorDescription.spanish: Mientras este frío piso no es la mejor elección para una habitación, queda bien con un taller.
stoneFloorDescription.portuguese: Enquanto este piso de pedra pode estar frio ao toque, é adequado para oficinas.
stoneFloorDescription.bulgarian: Докато този каменен под може да е студен на допир, той е подходящ за работилници.
stoneFloorDescription.turkish: Bu taştan zemin dokunuşlar için yapmacık olsa da atölye çalışmalarına uygundur.

stoneFloorCleanBricksDescription.english: This stone floor looks like it was built for eternity.
stoneFloorCleanBricksDescription.german: Dieser Steinboden sieht aus als könnte er für alle Ewigkeit bestehen.
stoneFloorCleanBricksDescription.french: Ce sol en pierre parait avoir été construit pour l'éternité.
stoneFloorCleanBricksDescription.spanish: Pareciera que este suelo de piedra fue construido para toda la eternidad.
stoneFloorCleanBricksDescription.portuguese: Este chão de pedra parece ter sido construído para a eternidade.
stoneFloorCleanBricksDescription.bulgarian: Този каменнен под изглежда, че е построен за вечността.
stoneFloorCleanBricksDescription.turkish: Bu taş zemin sonsuzluk için yapılmış gibi duruyor.

stoneFloorCleanTilesDescription.english: Nice and very clean. Still, eating from it is not recommended!
stoneFloorCleanTilesDescription.german: Sauberer und ordentlicher Boden. Nichtsdestoweniger ist es wohl nicht sehr ratsam davon zu essen!
stoneFloorCleanTilesDescription.french: Beau et très propre. Néanmoins, manger dessus n'est pas recommandé !
stoneFloorCleanTilesDescription.spanish: Bonito y muy limpio, pero no tanto como para comer sobre él.
stoneFloorCleanTilesDescription.portuguese: Linda e muito limpa. No entanto, comer nele não é recomendado!
stoneFloorCleanTilesDescription.bulgarian: Приятно и много чисто. И все пак, яденето от него не се препоръчва!
stoneFloorCleanTilesDescription.turkish: Güzel ve çok temiz. Yine de bunu yemek tavsiye edilmiyor!

pathStoneRoundDescription.english: This path makes walking so much more comfortable.
pathStoneRoundDescription.german: Dieser Pfad erleichtert das gehen ungemein.
pathStoneRoundDescription.french: Ce chemin rend la marche beaucoup plus confortable.
pathStoneRoundDescription.spanish: Este camino hace que caminar sea mucho más fácil.
pathStoneRoundDescription.portuguese: Este caminho faz andar muito mais confortável.
pathStoneRoundDescription.bulgarian: Този път прави ходенето толкова по-удобно.
pathStoneRoundDescription.turkish: Bu taş, yürüyüşleri çok daha konforlu hale getirecek.

pathDirtFullDescription.english: This path makes walking much more comfortable.
pathDirtFullDescription.german: Dieser Pfad erleichtert das gehen ungemein.
pathDirtFullDescription.french: Ce chemin rend la marche beaucoup plus confortable.
pathDirtFullDescription.spanish: Este camino hace que caminar sea mucho más fácil.
pathDirtFullDescription.portuguese: Esse caminho torna a caminhada muito mais confortável.
pathDirtFullDescription.bulgarian: Този път прави ходенето много по-удобно.
pathDirtFullDescription.turkish: Bu yol yürüyüşleri daha konforlu hale getirecek.
